idea-plugin.name: Lombok Builder Helper
idea-plugin.description:
Displays an error when non-null fields are not set when calling a Lombok @Builder

Quick-fix adds all non-null fields to the builder call
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Improvements

  • Automatically excludes Hibernate/JPA auto-generated fields (@CreationTimestamp, @UpdateTimestamp, @UuidGenerator, @GeneratedValue, @Id, etc.) from mandatory field checking
  • Registered registry keys in plugin.xml for better IDE integration
  • Added support for JPA/Hibernate @Column(nullable=false) detection (configurable via registry key)
  • Added registry key 'lombok.builder.helper.treat.jpa.nullable.false.as.mandatory' to control JPA nullable checking
  • Added registry key 'lombok.builder.helper.treat.primitives.as.mandatory' to make primitive field checking configurable
  • Now treats primitive typed fields as non nullable (can be disabled via registry key)

localInspection.displayName: Lombok builder is missing non-null fields

registryKey.description: When enabled, primitive typed fields (int, boolean, etc.) are treated as mandatory in Lombok builder calls and will show errors if not set.
When enabled, fields annotated with @Column(nullable=false) from JPA/Hibernate are treated as mandatory in Lombok builder calls.
